title: FS/FT:  Mid grade for sale including HOFers - Bender +
author: bounce

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  Mid grade for sale including HOFers - Bender +
posts.post_content:
Prefer to sell but I would consider trades. Ask around, I'm a pretty reasonable trade partner.

If trading, I only collect HOFers, mostly T206, a few T205 and some various E cards.  The occasional 1950s as well.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]. "I'll take it" trumps everything just for clarity. Prices are DLVD via PP F&F to keep it simple.


T206 Bender Portrait Sweet Cap 150/30 PSA 4 - $435 OBO
